column1: * 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Robert Burchfield (6 November 1954).
* 1969 - Informal date of foundation of The Tolkien Society.
* 2000 - Author L. Sprague de Camp dies.

column1: * 2002 - The Lord of the Rings: The Making of the Movie Trilogy is published.
* 2004 - User:Hyarion purchases the domain Tolkien Gateway.
* 2006 - Peter Jackson: A Film-makers Journey is published.
* 2009 - The wikipedia:Facebook application The One Ring (Facebook application) is launched.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
